pages.text: $(item)Fluid Shifters/$ are the fluid version of $(item)Item Shifters/$, and have a small internal tank, and eject any liquid into machines/inventories on the front. They cannot eject fluids into the world.$(br2)A line of Transport Chutes can be attached to the front to allows ejecting fluids to an inventory several blocks away (default limit: 16).
Handy for moving fluids cheaply and quickly, including upwards.
